channel.title: Need some help please:)
channel.description:
Hey. I am new to coding and such so i need a little help to fix some problems im having with starterscape. These are the problems... -Money on ground looks like a big pile but is only 1 coin. -when you sell things you only get 1 coin -when you spawn items you only get 1 of them(no matter how many you put in the code)
If someone can help me with these that would be great:) thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: June 12, 2007, 03:08:02 PM[/size][hr]comeon. Need some help here:P

item.title: Need some help please:)
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

to get more than one item, u need to put in noted id and then how much u want
except for when it’s stackable
then u use same id

the 1 coin thing is prolly a glitch in ur server, i’m sure some servers are like that

selling things - depends on what u sell, depends on what ur selling
go into item.cfg and find the item
change the first 3 items(low alch store sell and high alch prices i think)
but DON’T just change them
they gotta be divided by certain number that i dunno

Read full topic
